content.rendered:
This Week in Genesis, two shiny new themes, a new plugin from StudioPress, plus Chris Lema shows you how to build a Genesis site (without a Genesis child theme).

Themes

Imagely release (another!) great photography focused Genesis theme, Journal and launch an ‘all themes’ discount offer.

New Genesis photography theme, Journal, and 'all themes' discount offer from @imagely https://t.co/X5ECJBsyTp pic.twitter.com/yR12QSrXB8

— GenesisWPguide (@GenesisWPguide) May 28, 2016

ZigZagPress release their 30th(!) Genesis theme, Chic.

Just released: Chic, an elegant ecommerce theme, our 30th #genesiswp child themehttps://t.co/WhrndFVjHJ

— zigzagpress.com (@zigzagpress) June 1, 2016

Showcase

Nice redesign by Joelle Cottle for eatrealfoodacademy.com

Eat Real Food Academy Website Redesign by @joellecottle https://t.co/09gfI9V45v pic.twitter.com/luZaSzBxjQ

— GenesisWPguide (@GenesisWPguide) May 29, 2016

Lisa Wood with a new site based on the Agency Pro theme for springboarddm.com

Website redesign for SpringBoard Data Management by @lisawood https://t.co/632dS7c1tj pic.twitter.com/APZYARNxGb

— GenesisWPguide (@GenesisWPguide) May 29, 2016

Fun site built on Genesis and Beaver Builder from IdeaBox Creations for hi-chew.com

Wow! @HiChew got a new, cool website! https://t.co/5EYPUI2RZG powered by #genesiswp @BeaverBuilder and #WP love from @helloideabox

— Puneet Sahalot (@psahalot) June 2, 2016

Nicholas Duell and Ren Zatopek for thegreenmanstore.com

New showcase site, The Green Man Store, by @NicholasDuell and @RenZatopek https://t.co/zL4sizhZaC pic.twitter.com/3sQNyVFVjm

— GenesisWPguide (@GenesisWPguide) June 2, 2016

Patricia Alix Villa for dairingbrides.com

So excited to announce the launch of https://t.co/a37lsbIJXn! Do check it out! #Wordpress #Genesiswp #webdesign pic.twitter.com/yyXFrWDfi3

— Patricia Alix Villa (@PatFancyGirl) June 3, 2016

Tara Claeys for hesiglobal.org

New site launch! Custom Genesis with Beaver Builder added. https://t.co/CDrQXCPNjN #genesiswp @BeaverBuilder @HESI_Global

— Tara Claeys (@design_tlc) June 2, 2016

Good use of the Digital Pro theme from Katie Rosebraugh for melindasykes.com

Launched Melinda's site: https://t.co/RVc2aJWUxk using the Digital Pro theme. Melinda is busting out of the 9-5 into her own biz! #genesiswp

— Katie Rosebraugh (@mskatiegail) June 1, 2016

Podcasts

On OfficeHours.fm, Carrie catches up with Jeff Matson, documentation genius at Rocket Genius (AKA Gravity Forms).

Did you miss today's episode with @thejeffmatson? Never fear! The replay is here!https://t.co/awHjdMweGG

— Office Hours Podcast (@officehoursfm) June 2, 2016

Plugins

Somehow I missed this before (yes, I do miss things occasionally), but the Genesis Portfolio Pro plugin by StudioPress is now in the wild.

Been waiting for this; #genesiswp portfolio pro plugin https://t.co/AWtGbp0uRM

— Dave Browne (@yivva) June 2, 2016

Best of the rest

Chris Lema with an interesting take on building a site without any Genesis child themes.

Building a site without any Genesis child themes. https://t.co/Cq3aLu7Sxm

— Chris Lema (@chrislema) May 31, 2016

Calvin Koepke with a handy reminder, if you needed one, on why digital creatives love the Genesis Framework.

New: Why Digital Creatives Love the Genesis Framework: https://t.co/0nblbSVa0M #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/oeyQJZ148R

— Calvin Koepke (@cjkoepke) May 31, 2016

Gary Jones shares a video talk about web accessibility (featuring four Genesis developers!) at WordCamp London.

Four #genesiswp developers talk about web accessibility on stage at #wcldn: https://t.co/NmdYcRfSFV #a11y

— Gary Jones (@GaryJ) May 28, 2016

Sridhar on how to enable an Author Box in Genesis on single entries of ‘post’ type only, and how to force a layout for Pages that have subpages in Genesis.

How to enable Author Box in #GenesisWP on single entries of 'post' type only:https://t.co/PUH8IOD0BA

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) May 31, 2016

And finally…

A little reminder for the developers amongst you from Nathan Rice that the 2.3 dev cycle for Genesis is underway.

If you build #GenesisWP themes or plugins and use term meta, please keep this in mind! https://t.co/gz7PkKUFxZ

2.3 dev cycle is underway!

— Nathan Rice (@nathanrice) May 27, 2016

That’s all for this week, have an awesome weekend.

PS Want Genesis awesomeness (almost) every day? Follow @GenesisWPguide on Twitter and make your day even more exciting.

excerpt.rendered: Fresh new themes, a new plugin from StudioPress, and Chris Lema on how to build a Genesis site (without a Genesis child theme).
